parameters.name: AutoCreateRepo
parameters.description: Specifies whether to automatically create an image repository in the namespace.

parameters.name: DefaultRepoType
parameters.description:
The default type of the repository that is automatically created. Valid values:

*   `PUBLIC`: a public repository
*   `PRIVATE`: a private repository

parameters.name: NamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the namespace. The name must be 2 to 120 characters in length, and can contain lowercase letters, digits, and the following delimiters: underscores (\_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). The name cannot start or end with a delimiter.
